about_the_game:
Cat Tower is a horror-themed turn-based RPG with a lot of focus on character building. The game is set in a small brazillian city that is in verge of collapsing after an ominous tower appears beside it overnight.

Features

  • A wide array of different spell cards to suit different strategies and styles of play.

  • Several talents with effects that range from slight advantages to effects that can fuck over everyone including yourself.

  • Six basic attributes that can help you either complement your play or cover your weaknesses.

  • Various different allies, all of which can be strengthened and upgraded.

  • Free ability to reset your entire character at any point in the game.

  • Banger ass soundtrack

name: The Cat Tower Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: yes
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: yes
  • Sound Card: yes
  • VR Support: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this turn-based RPG, follow the story of a woman fighting off a terrible curse in order to save a loved one. Discover spells, choose talents, adjust attributes, recruit powerful allies, and reset your build to explore new strategies in order survive the treacherous world ahead.
